ja427:0.1_0: The group of twelve on “as expected”
ja427:0.4_0: those who are caught up in the category.
ja427:1.2_0: he is hit, true to the Eternal.
ja427:1.4_0: like a calf wearing an old man.
ja427:10.1_0: when it had flew off, she first has fallen off.
ja427:2.4_0: and racked away by desire for rebirth.
ja427:3.2_0: who gave birth to the child
ja427:3.4_0: like a wheel, the ox’s foot.
ja427:4.2_0: who is strong, best of men,
ja427:5.4_0: like a wheel, the ox’s foot.
ja427:6.1_0: But a mindful disciple of the Buddha
ja427:6.3_0: Whatever you speak of the teaching
ja427:7.4_0: falling under the sway of enmity.
ja427:8.2_0: and others who live on charity;
ja427:8.4_0: who has not reached twelve years of seniority.
ja427:9.1_0: this is how those who have growth
ja427:9.5_0: They fall to ruin and disaster,
ja427:9.6_0: in the teaching of the senior monks.”
